column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: A day of rain on the coast brought the predictable results on the streets of Sihanoukville. Flooding caused problems in Sangkats 3 and 4
column4: while traffic around the drier areas of town turned to gridlock.------The blame has once been placed on the sewage and drainage systems
column5: with authorities promising to take action.------With another 12-16 weeks of rainy season remaining
column6: it is a safe bet that these scenes will be repeated as was the case in ------twice------ in------July ------April------December------and plenty of other occasions. (Photos from various Facebook posts)
